TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: All Blasters Are Ionized
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, all blasters will have a 25% chance of adding Ion Buildup like Ion blasters are guaranteed to.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Fast Ion
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, changes Ion Buildup to be instantly maxed out instead of starting at 50% and increasing by 30% per following shot.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Explosive Ion
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, reverts Ion Buildup to its old behaviour where mechanoids would violently explode upon death.
